spl.title: Dolgencorp, LLC Pain Relief Drug Facts

sections.title: Uses
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>temporarily relieves minor aches and pains due to:<list listType="unordered">
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>the common cold</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>headache</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>minor pain of arthritis</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>backache</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>muscular aches</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>toothache</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>premenstrual and menstrual cramps</item>
                        </list>
                     </item>
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>temporarily reduces fever</item>
                  </list>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: • temporarily relieves minor aches and pains due to: • the common cold • headache • minor pain of arthritis • backache • muscular aches • toothache • premenstrual and menstrual cramps • temporarily reduces fever

sections.title: Warnings
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Liver warning:</content> This product contains acetaminophen. Severe liver damage may occur if you take</paragraph>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>more than 4,000 mg of acetaminophen in 24 hours</item>
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>with other drugs containing acetaminophen</item>
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>3 or more alcoholic drinks every day while using this product</item>
                  </list>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Allergy alert:</content> Acetaminophen may cause severe skin reactions. Symptoms may include:</paragraph>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>skin reddening</item>
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>blisters</item>
                     <item>
                        <caption>•</caption>rash</item>
                  </list>
                  <paragraph>If a skin reaction occurs, stop use and seek medical help right away.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Liver warning: This product contains acetaminophen. Severe liver damage may occur if you take • more than 4,000 mg of acetaminophen in 24 hours • with other drugs containing acetaminophen • 3 or more alcoholic drinks every day while using this product Allergy alert: Acetaminophen may cause severe skin reactions. Symptoms may include: • skin reddening • blisters • rash If a skin reaction occurs, stop use and seek medical help right away.

sections.title: Do not use
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                        <list listType="unordered">
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>with any other drug containing acetaminophen (prescription or nonprescription). If you are not sure whether a drug contains acetaminophen, ask a doctor or pharmacist.</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>if you have ever had an allergic reaction to this product or any of its ingredients</item>
                        </list>
                     </text>
sections.text_plain: • with any other drug containing acetaminophen (prescription or nonprescription). If you are not sure whether a drug contains acetaminophen, ask a doctor or pharmacist. • if you have ever had an allergic reaction to this product or any of its ingredients

sections.title: Ask a doctor before use if you have
Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are
sections.text_plain: taking the blood thinning drug warfarin

sections.title: Stop use and ask a doctor if
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                        <list listType="unordered">
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>pain gets worse or lasts more than 10 days</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>fever gets worse or lasts more than 3 days</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>new symptoms occur</item>
                           <item>
                              <caption>•</caption>redness or swelling is present<paragraph>These could be signs of a serious condition.</paragraph>
                           </item>
                        </list>
                     </text>
sections.text_plain: • pain gets worse or lasts more than 10 days • fever gets worse or lasts more than 3 days • new symptoms occur • redness or swelling is present These could be signs of a serious condition.

sections.display: OTC - PREGNANCY OR BREAST FEEDING SECTION
sections.title: If pregnant or breast-feeding,
sections.text_plain: ask a health professional before use.

sections.display: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION
sections.title: Keep out of reach of children.
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                        <paragraph>
                           <content styleCode="bold">Overdose warning:</content> In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away (1-800-222-1222). Quick medical attention is critical for adults as well as for children even if you do not notice any signs or symptoms.</paragraph>
                     </text>
sections.text_plain: Overdose warning: In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away (1-800-222-1222). Quick medical attention is critical for adults as well as for children even if you do not notice any signs or symptoms.

sections.title: Directions
sections.text_xhtml:
• do not take more than directed (see overdose warning) take 2 caplets every 6 hours while symptoms last do not take more than 6 caplets in 24 hours, unless directed by a doctor do not use for more than 10 days unless directed by a doctor
adults and children 12 years and over
• • •
children under 12 years ask a doctor
sections.text_plain: • do not take more than directed (see overdose warning) adults and children 12 years and over • take 2 caplets every 6 hours while symptoms last • do not take more than 6 caplets in 24 hours, unless directed by a doctor • do not use for more than 10 days unless directed by a doctor children under 12 years ask a doctor

sections.title: Inactive ingredients
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>croscarmellose sodium, crospovidone, FD&C red #40 aluminum lake, FD&C yellow #6 aluminum lake, hypromellose, mica-based pearlescent pigment, polyethylene glycol, polysorbate 80, povidone, pregelatinized starch, stearic acid</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: croscarmellose sodium, crospovidone, FD&C red #40 aluminum lake, FD&C yellow #6 aluminum lake, hypromellose, mica-based pearlescent pigment, polyethylene glycol, polysorbate 80, povidone, pregelatinized starch, stearic acid
